trans-unit.source: PARTITION () clause on non partitioned table
trans-unit.target: 在非分区表上使用PARTITION()子句。

trans-unit.source: PARTITION -- Requires some careful setup, but is excellent for purging a time-base series.
trans-unit.target: PARTITION --需要一些仔细的设置,但对于清除时间基数系列来说是非常好的。

trans-unit.source: PARTITION BY LIST indicates that the partitioning type is LIST.
trans-unit.target: PARTITION BY LIST表示分区类型为LIST。

trans-unit.source: PARTITION BY RANGE indicates that the partitioning type is RANGE.
trans-unit.target: PARTITION BY RANGE表示分区类型为RANGE。

trans-unit.source: PARTITION BY RANGE is a technique that is sometimes useful when indexing fails to be good enough. In a two-dimensional situation such as nearness in a geographical sense, one dimension can partially be handled by partition pruning; then the other dimension can be handled by a regular index (preferrably the PRIMARY KEY). This goes into more detail: Find nearest 10 pizza parlors.
trans-unit.target: 按范围分区是一项技术，当索引编制不够好时，有时会很有用。在诸如地理意义上的接近性之类的二维情况下，可以通过分区修剪来部分处理一维；那么其他维度可以由常规索引（最好是PRIMARY KEY）处理。详细介绍：找到最近的10家披萨店。

trans-unit.source: PARTITION BY RANGE is the only useful method.
trans-unit.target: PARTITION BY RANGE是唯一有用的方法。

trans-unit.source: PARTITION maintenance for the time-series case
trans-unit.target: 时间序列案例的部分维护

trans-unit.source: PARTITION tables have a lot of restrictions, some are rather weird. You can either have no UNIQUE (or PRIMARY) key on the table, or every UNIQUE key must include the partition key. In this use case, the partition key is the datetime. It should not be the first part of the PRIMARY KEY (if you have a PRIMARY KEY).
trans-unit.target: PARTITION表有很多限制,有些限制相当奇怪。你可以在表上没有UNIQUE(或PRIMARY)键,或者每个UNIQUE键都必须包括partition键。在这个用例中,分区键是datetime。它不应该是PRIMARY KEY的第一部分(如果你有PRIMARY KEY的话)。

trans-unit.source: PARTITIONing is rarely a substitute for a good INDEX.
PARTITIONing splits up one table into several smaller tables. But table size is rarely a performance issue. Instead, I/O time and indexes are the issues.
trans-unit.target: PARTITIONING将一个表分割成几个小表。但表的大小很少是性能问题。相反,I/O时间和索引才是问题所在。

trans-unit.source: PBXT is a general purpose transactional storage engine. It's however not maintained anymore.
trans-unit.target: PBXT是一个通用的事务性存储引擎。然而它已经不再维护了。

trans-unit.source: PBXT is a general purpose transactional storage engine. PBXT is fully "ACID" compliant, which means it can be used as an alternative to other MariaDB transactional engines (such as XtraDB or InnoDB).
trans-unit.target: PBXT 是一个通用的事务性存储引擎,它完全符合 "ACID "标准,这意味着它可以用来替代其他 MariaDB 事务性引擎(如 XtraDB 或 InnoDB)。PBXT完全符合 "ACID "标准,这意味着它可以作为其他MariaDB事务性引擎(如XtraDB或InnoDB)的替代品。

trans-unit.source: PBXT is no longer maintained, and is not part of MariaDB 5.5 or later.
trans-unit.target: PBXT不再维护，也不属于MariaDB 5.5或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: PBXT stores part of the database in the data logs. This is mostly data from rows containing long VARCHAR fields or BLOB data. The data logs are managed by the "compactor" thread. When a record is deleted from a data log, the data is marked as garbage. When the total garbage in a data log reaches a certain threshold, the compactor thread compacts the data log by copying the valid data to a new data log, and deleting the old data log.
trans-unit.target: PBXT 在数据日志中存储了数据库的部分数据。这主要是包含长VARCHAR字段或BLOB数据的行的数据。数据日志由 "压缩器 "线程管理。当从数据日志中删除一条记录时,数据会被标记为垃圾。当数据日志中的垃圾总量达到一定的阈值时,"压实器 "线程就会对数据日志进行压实,将有效数据复制到新的数据日志中,并删除旧的数据日志。

trans-unit.source: PBXT will not take any resources (disk space or CPU processing) until you create your first PBXT table.
trans-unit.target: 在您创建第一个 PBXT 表之前,PBXT 不会占用任何资源(磁盘空间或 CPU 处理)。

Please refer to the PCRE documentation for details.

trans-unit.target: 该表空间的页面大小,以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Page state; one of FILE_PAGE (page from a file) or MEMORY (page from an in-memory object) for valid data, or one of NULL, READY_FOR_USE, NOT_USED, REMOVE_HASH.
trans-unit.target: 页面状态；之一 FILE_PAGE （页从文件）或 MEMORY （页面从内存中的对象）的有效数据，或者一个 NULL ， READY_FOR_USE ， NOT_USED ， REMOVE_HASH 。

trans-unit.source: Page tables have a number of characteristics:
Page that a background encryption thread is currently rotating. If key rotation is not enabled, then the value will be NULL.
trans-unit.target: 第一个后台加密线程正在旋转。如果未启用键旋转，则该值为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Page that the scrubbing thread is currently scrubbing, or NULL if not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 洗涤线程当前正在洗涤的页面，如果未启用，则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Page type; one of allocated (newly-allocated page), index (B-tree node), undo_log (undo log page), inode (index node), ibuf_free_list (insert buffer free list), ibuf_bitmap (insert buffer bitmap), system (system page), trx_system (transaction system data), file_space_header (file space header), extent_descriptor (extent descriptor page), blob (uncompressed blob page), compressed_blob (first compressed blob page), compressed_blob2 (subsequent compressed blob page) or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 页面类型；已 allocated （新分配的页面）， index （B树节点）， undo_log （撤消日志页面）， inode （索引节点）， ibuf_free_list （插入缓冲区可用列表）， ibuf_bitmap （插入缓冲区位图）， system （系统页面）之一）， trx_system （事务系统数据）， file_space_header （文件空间标头）， extent_descriptor （扩展描述符页面）， blob （未压缩的blob页面）， compressed_blob （第一个压缩的blob页面）， compressed_blob2 （随后的压缩的blob页面）或 unknown 。

trans-unit.source: Pages are modified in the buffer pool, and not immediately on disk. When rows are deleted, a flag is set, thus rows are not immediately deleted on disk. Later the changes will be written to disk (''flushed'') by InnoDB background threads. Pages that have been modified in memory and not yet flushed are called dirty pages. The buffering of data changes is called Change Buffer.
trans-unit.target: 页面在缓冲池中被修改，而不是立即在磁盘上被修改。当删除行时，会设置一个标志，因此不会立即在磁盘上删除行。稍后，更改将由InnoDB后台线程写入磁盘（“刷新”）。已在内存中修改但尚未刷新的页面称为脏页面。数据更改的缓冲称为更改缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Pages are not compressed. This is the default value in MariaDB 10.2.3 and before, and MariaDB 10.1.21 and before.

trans-unit.target: 父OAM模块是性能模块，用于监视整个系统，包括所有UM和PM节点及其状态，以及处理PM节点故障转移。在运行中的PM节点超过1个的系统中，将有2个父OAM模块-一个活动父节点和一个备用父节点。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses are sometimes called precedence operators - this means that they can be used to change the other operator's precedence in an expression. The expressions that are written between parentheses are computed before the expressions that are written outside. Parentheses must always contain an expression (that is, they cannot be empty), and can be nested.
trans-unit.target: 括号有时称为优先级运算符-这意味着它们可用于更改表达式中其他运算符的优先级。括号之间编写的表达式是在外部编写的表达式之前计算的。括号必须始终包含一个表达式（也就是说，它们不能为空），并且可以嵌套。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses can also be used in a JOIN statement between multiple tables to determine which tables must be joined first.
trans-unit.target: 也可以在多个表之间的 JOIN 语句中使用括号，以确定必须首先连接的表。
用于指定优先级的括号，来自MariaDB 10.4.0

trans-unit.source: Parentheses modify the precedence of other operators in an expression
trans-unit.target: 在表达式中,括号可以修改其他运算符的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Parentheses must always be used to enclose subqueries.
trans-unit.target: 必须始终使用括号将子查询括起来。

trans-unit.source: Partition pruning does not happen on INSERTs (until Version 5.6.7), so INSERT needs to open all the partitions.
trans-unit.target: 分区修剪不会发生在INSERT上(直到5.6.7版本),所以INSERT需要打开所有的分区。

trans-unit.source: Partition pruning is when the optimizer knows which partitions are relevant for the query
trans-unit.target: 分区修剪是指当优化器知道哪些分区与查询相关的时候

trans-unit.source: Partition specific operations do not yet support LOCK/ALGORITHM
trans-unit.target: 分区的具体操作尚不支持LOCK/ALGORITHM。

trans-unit.source: Partition state cannot be defined from CREATE/ALTER TABLE
trans-unit.target: 不能从CREATE/ALTER TABLE中定义分区状态。

trans-unit.source: Partition tables can be located on remote servers, enabling table sharding.
trans-unit.target: 分区表可以位于远程服务器上,实现表的共享。

trans-unit.source: Partitioned Column Scan - an operation that uses the Extent Map to identify that certain portions of the column do not contain any matching values for a given set of filters. The closest analogy for a traditional row-based DBMS is a partitioned index scan, or partitioned table scan operation.
trans-unit.target: 分区列扫描--使用 "扩展图 "来识别列的某些部分不包含给定过滤器集的任何匹配值的操作。对于传统的基于行的DBMS来说,最接近的类比是分区索引扫描,或分区表扫描操作。

trans-unit.source: Partitioned Cumulative Sum and Running Max Example
trans-unit.target: 分割累计总和和运行最大值实例

trans-unit.source: Partitioning allows one to distribute files over multiple storage devices. For example, we can have historical data on slower, larger disks (historical data are not supposed to be frequently read); and current data can be on faster disks, or SSD devices.
trans-unit.target: 分区可以让人将文件分布在多个存储设备上。例如,我们可以将历史数据放在较慢、较大的磁盘上(历史数据不应该被频繁读取);而当前数据可以放在较快的磁盘上,或者SSD设备上。

trans-unit.source: Partitioning by SYSTEM_TIME also supports automatic partition rotation. One can rotate historical partitions by time or by size. This example shows how to rotate partitions by size:
trans-unit.target: 通过 SYSTEM_TIME 进行分区也支持自动分区旋转。可以按时间或大小旋转历史分区。此示例显示如何按大小旋转分区：

trans-unit.source: Partitioning can not be used stand-alone in query
trans-unit.target: 在查询中不能单独使用分区。

trans-unit.source: Partitioning enables you to distribute portions of individual tables across a file system according to rules which you can set largely as needed. In effect, different portions of a table are stored as separate tables in different locations. The user-selected rule by which the division of data is accomplished is known as a partitioning function, which in MariaDB can be the modulus, simple matching against a set of ranges or value lists, an internal hashing function, or a linear hashing function.
trans-unit.target: 分区使您能够根据规则在文件系统中分配各个表的部分,您可以根据需要设置这些规则。实际上,一个表的不同部分被作为单独的表存储在不同的位置。用户选择的完成数据划分的规则称为分区函数,在MariaDB中,分区函数可以是模数、与一组范围或值列表的简单匹配、内部哈希函数或线性哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: Partitioning is also supported. See how to do it in the section about partitioning.
trans-unit.target: 也支持分区。请参阅关于分区的章节中的操作方法。

trans-unit.source: Password to use when connecting to server. If you use the short option form (-p), you cannot have a space between the option and the password. If you omit the password value following the --password or -p option on the command line, mysql prompts for one. Specifying a password on the command line should be considered insecure. You can use an option file to avoid giving the password on the command line.

trans-unit.source: Pauses for the given number of seconds
Pauses for the given number of seconds.

Pausing a container is very useful when we need to temporarily free our system's resources. If the container is not crucial at this moment (for example, it is performing some batch work), we can free it to allow other programs to run faster.
trans-unit.target: 当我们需要暂时释放系统的资源时,暂停一个容器是非常有用的。如果容器在此刻并不重要(例如,它正在执行一些批处理工作),我们可以释放它,让其他程序更快地运行。

trans-unit.target: 每个帐户的资源限制存储在 mysql 数据库的 user 表中。用于资源限制的列名为 max_questions ， max_updates ， max_connections （对于 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR ）和 max_user_connections （对于 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS ）。

trans-unit.source: Per record viewing of data differences

Per the Oracle documentation (https://docs.oracle.com/javacomponents/usage-tracker/overview/) the “Usage Tracker” is disabled by default. It is enabled only when creating the properties file <JRE directory>/lib/management/usagetracker.properties. This turns out to be WRONG on some platforms as the file does exist by default on a new installation, and the existence of this file enables the usage tracker.
trans-unit.target: 根据Oracle文档（https://docs.oracle.com/javacomponents/usage-tracker/overview/），默认情况下禁用“使用跟踪器”。仅在创建属性文件<JRE目录> /lib/management/usagetracker.properties时启用。在某些平台上，这是错误的，因为默认情况下该文件在新安装中确实存在，并且此文件的存在启用了使用情况跟踪器。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup can also be installed via a package manager on Linux. In order to do so, your system needs to be configured to install from a repository that has it.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup也可以通过Linux上的软件包管理器进行安装。要做到这一点,你的系统需要被配置为从有它的仓库安装。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup copies its InnoDB redo log files to the file xtrabackup_logfile, while Mariabackup uses the file ib_logfile0.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup将其InnoDB重做日志文件复制到文件 xtrabackup_logfile ，而Mariabackup使用文件 ib_logfile0 。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup does not need to authenticate with the database server when preparing or restoring a backup.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup在准备或恢复备份时不需要与数据库服务器进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup has to read MariaDB's files from the file system. Therefore, when you run Percona XtraBackup as a specific operating system user, you should ensure that user account has sufficient permissions to read those files.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup必须从文件系统中读取MariaDB的文件。因此,当你以特定的操作系统用户运行Percona XtraBackup时,你应该确保用户账户有足够的权限来读取这些文件。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup implemented support for lock-less binary log information in 2.3.2. When the Lockless binary log information feature is available [1] on the server, Percona XtraBackup can trust binary log information stored in the InnoDB system header and avoid executing LOCK BINLOG FOR BACKUP (and thus, blocking commits for the duration of finalizing the REDO log copy) under a number of circumstances:
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup在2.3.2中实现了对无锁二进制日志信息的支持。当服务器上的无锁二进制日志信息功能可用时[1],Percona XtraBackup可以信任存储在InnoDB系统头中的二进制日志信息,并在一些情况下避免执行LOCK BINLOG FOR BACKUP(从而在最终完成REDO日志副本的期间阻止提交)。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup is an open source tool for performing hot backups of MariaDB, MySQL and Percona Server databases. Percona XtraBackup can perform compressed, incremental and streaming backups. It was designed to back up XtraDB/InnoDB tables but can also back up other storage engines.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup是用于执行MariaDB，MySQL和Percona Server数据库热备份的开源工具。Percona XtraBackup可以执行压缩，增量和流式备份。它旨在备份XtraDB / InnoDB表，但也可以备份其他存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup needs to authenticate with the database server when it performs a backup operation (i.e. when the --backup option is specified). The user account that performs the backup needs to have the RELOAD , PROCESS, LOCK TABLES and REPLICATION CLIENTglobal privileges on the database server. For example:
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraBackup在执行备份操作时（即，当指定 --backup 选项时）需要与数据库服务器进行身份验证。执行备份的用户帐户需要在数据库服务器上具有 RELOAD ， PROCESS ， LOCK TABLES 和 REPLICATION CLIENT 全局特权。例如：

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraBackup's libgcrypt-based encryption of backups is not supported by Mariabackup.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup 不支持Percona XtraBackup 基于 libgcrypt的备份加密。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraDB includes all of InnoDB's robust, reliable ACID-compliant design and advanced MVCC architecture, and builds on that solid foundation with more features, more tunability, more metrics, and more scalability. In particular, it is designed to scale better on many cores, to use memory more efficiently, and to be more convenient and useful. The new features are especially designed to alleviate some of InnoDB's limitations. We choose features and fixes based on customer requests and on our best judgment of real-world needs as a high-performance consulting company.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraDB包括InnoDB的所有健壮，可靠的，符合ACID的设计和高级MVCC架构，并基于具有更多功能，更多可调性，更多度量和更多可伸缩性的坚实基础而构建。尤其是，它旨在在许多内核上更好地扩展，更有效地使用内存以及更加方便和有用。这些新功能专门用于减轻InnoDB的某些限制。我们是根据高性能咨询公司的客户要求和对现实世界需求的最佳判断来选择功能和修补程序的。

trans-unit.source: Percona XtraDB is an enhanced version of the InnoDB storage engine, designed to better scale on modern hardware, and it includes a variety of other features useful in high performance environments.
trans-unit.target: Percona XtraDB是InnoDB存储引擎的增强版,旨在更好地在现代硬件上进行扩展,它还包含了在高性能环境中有用的各种其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Percona blog about how to upgrade slave to master
trans-unit.target: Percona博客介绍如何将从站升级为主站。

trans-unit.source: Percona has a thread_pool_high_prio_tickets connection variable to allow every nth low priority query to be put into the high priority queue. MariaDB does not have corresponding settings.
trans-unit.target: Percona有一个thread_pool_high_prio_tickets的连接变量,可以让每第n个低优先级查询放入高优先级队列。MariaDB没有相应的设置。

trans-unit.source: Percona, the provider of XtraDB, does not provide all earlier XtraDB features in the 5.5 code base. Because of that, MariaDB 5.5 can't provide them either. The following options are not supported by XtraDB 5.5. If you are using them in any of your my.cnf files, you should remove them before upgrading to 5.5.
trans-unit.target: XtraDB的提供者Percona 在5.5代码库中未提供所有较早的XtraDB功能。因此，MariaDB 5.5也无法提供它们。XtraDB 5.5不支持以下选项。如果要在任何my.cnf文件中使用它们，则应在升级到5.5之前将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Perconas guide of how to upgrade to 5.5

Perform EXPLAIN SELECT... (and EXPLAIN FORMAT=JSON SELECT... if you have 5.6.5). Look at the Key that it chose, and the Key_len. From those you can deduce how many columns of the index are being used for filtering. (JSON makes it easier to get the answer.) From that you can decide whether it is using as much of the INDEX as you thought. Caveat: Key_len only covers the WHERE part of the action; the non-JSON output won't easily say whether GROUP BY or ORDER BY was handled by the index.
trans-unit.target: 执行EXPLAIN SELECT...(如果你有5.6.5版本,则执行EXPLAIN FORMAT=JSON SELECT...)。查看它选择的Key,以及Key_len。从这些可以推断出索引有多少列被用于过滤。(JSON使它更容易得到答案。)由此你可以决定它是否像你想象的那样使用了那么多的INDEX。注意:Key_len只涵盖了动作的WHERE部分,非JSON的输出不会轻易说出是GROUP BY还是ORDER BY被索引处理。

trans-unit.source: Performance Module (PM): The PM executes granular job steps received from a UM in a multi-threaded manner. ColumnStore allows distribution of the work across many Performance Modules. The UM is composed of the MariaDB mysqld process and ExeMgr process.

trans-unit.source: Performance: by design performance of the cluster cannot be higher than performance of the slowest node; however, even if you have only one node, its performance can be considerably lower comparing to running the same server in a standalone mode (without wsrep provider). It is particularly true for big enough transactions (even those which are well within current limitations on transaction size quoted above).
trans-unit.target: 性能:根据设计,集群的性能不可能高于最慢的节点的性能;但是,即使你只有一个节点,其性能也会比在独立模式下运行相同的服务器(没有wsrep提供商)低很多。对于足够大的交易(甚至是那些在当前交易规模限制范围内的交易)来说尤其如此。

trans-unit.source: Performances vary a great deal depending on the table type. For instance, ODBC tables are only retrieved as fast as the other DBMS can do. If you have a lot of queries to execute, the best way to optimize your work can be sometime to translate the data from one type to another. Fortunately this is very simple with CONNECT. Fixed formats like FIX, BIN or VEC tables can be created from slower ones by commands such as:
trans-unit.target: 根据表的类型,性能差异很大。例如,ODBC表的检索速度只有其他DBMS能做到的。如果你有很多查询要执行,优化工作的最好方法可以某次把数据从一种类型翻译成另一种类型。幸运的是,这在CONNECT中非常简单。固定格式的表,如FIX、BIN或VEC表,可以通过命令从较慢的表中创建,如。

trans-unit.source: Performs a pattern match of a string expression expr against a pattern pat. The pattern can be an extended regular expression. See Regular Expressions Overview for details on the syntax for regular expressions (but see also PCRE Regular Expressions for syntax introduced in MariaDB 10.0.5).
trans-unit.target: 执行字符串表达式 expr 与模式 pat 的模式匹配。模式可以是扩展的正则表达式。有关正则表达式语法的详细信息，请参见正则表达式概述（但对于MariaDB 10.0.5中引入的语法，另请参见PCRE正则表达式）。

trans-unit.source: Performs date arithmetic. The date argument specifies the starting date or datetime value. expr is an expression specifying the interval value to be added or subtracted from the starting date. expr is a string; it may start with a "-" for negative intervals. unit is a keyword indicating the units in which the expression should be interpreted. See Date and Time Units for a complete list of permitted units.
trans-unit.target: 执行日期算术。该日期参数指定起始日期或日期时间值。expr是一个表达式，指定要从开始日期开始增加或减少的间隔值。expr是一个字符串；它可以以“ - ” 开头表示负间隔。unit是一个关键字，指示应解释表达式的单位。有关允许的单位的完整列表，请参见日期和时间单位。

trans-unit.source: Performs the inverse operation of HEX(str). That is, it interprets each pair of hexadecimal digits in the argument as a number and converts it to the character represented by the number. The resulting characters are returned as a binary string.
trans-unit.target: 执行十六进制（str）的逆运算。即，它将参数中的每对十六进制数字解释为一个数字，并将其转换为该数字表示的字符。结果字符将作为二进制字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: Perhaps you noticed some odd things in the example. Let me explain them.
trans-unit.target: 也许你注意到这个例子中的一些奇怪的东西。让我来解释一下。

trans-unit.source: Period between hits that is faster than executing the query without query cache (a good hit rate have many hits here), removing this query entry will consume more time than returning value from query cache
trans-unit.target: 在没有查询缓存的情况下,点击之间的时间间隔要比执行查询快(一个好的点击率在这里有很多点击),删除这个查询条目会比从查询缓存中返回值消耗更多的时间。

trans-unit.source: Period between hits that is higher than is not HIGH or LOW
trans-unit.target: 命中之间的时期，高于不 HIGH 或 LOW

trans-unit.source: Period between hits that is slower than executing the query without query cache and is 10 times faster than executing the query without query cache, but isn't slow than 1 second, removing this query will not give problems to users but will increase disk i/o - in future version "10 times" should be replaced to number of competitors trying to include the same query +1
trans-unit.target: 比执行没有查询缓存的查询慢,比执行没有查询缓存的查询快10倍,但不慢于1秒的点击之间的时间段,去掉这个查询不会给用户带来问题,但会增加磁盘I/O--在未来的版本中,"10倍 "应该改为试图包含相同查询的竞争对手的数量+1。

trans-unit.source: Plan A is to say LIMIT 51. If you are on page 12, that would give you links for pages 13 (using 11th id) through pages 17 (51st).
trans-unit.target: A计划是说LIMIT 51。如果你在第12页,那就会给你提供第13页(使用第11个id)到第17页(第51页)的链接。

trans-unit.source: Plan A: "While inserting" rows into the Fact table, augment the summary table(s). This is simple, and workable for a smaller DW database (under 10 Fact table rows per second). For larger DW databases, Plan A likely to be too costly to be practical.
trans-unit.target: 计划A:"在向事实表插入 "行时,增加汇总表。这很简单,对于较小的DW数据库来说是可行的(每秒钟少于10行事实表)。对于较大的DW数据库,A计划可能成本太高,不切实际。

trans-unit.source: Plan A: Use a compound "left off" (eg, TIMESTAMP + ID). This is messy, error prone, etc.
trans-unit.target: 计划A:使用复合式 "左关"(如:TIMESTAMP+ID)。这样很乱,容易出错等。

trans-unit.source: Plan B is to do two queries, one to get the 10 items for the current page, the other to get the next 41 ids (LIMIT 10, 41) for the next 5 pages.
trans-unit.target: B计划是做两个查询,一个是获取当前页面的10个项目,另一个是获取接下来5页的41个id(limit 10,41)。

trans-unit.source: Plan B: "Periodically", via cron or an EVENT.
Plan B: WHERE ts >= $left_off AND ts < $max_ts -- avoids dups, but has other problems (below)
trans-unit.target: 方案B：ts> = $ left_off且ts <$ max_ts的地方-避免重复，但存在其他问题（如下）

trans-unit.source: Plan C: "As needed". That is, when someone asks for a report, the code first updates the summary tables that will be needed.
trans-unit.target: C计划:"根据需要"。就是说,当有人要求提供报告时,代码首先更新需要的汇总表。

trans-unit.source: Plan D: "Hybrid" of B and C. C, by itself, can led to long delays for the report. By also doing B, those delays can be kept low.
trans-unit.target: D计划:B和C的 "混合体",C本身会导致报告的长时间延误。如果同时进行B的工作,则可以将这些延误保持在较低水平。

trans-unit.source: Plan E: (This is not advised.) "Rebuild" the entire summary table from the entire Fact table. The cost of this is prohibitive for large tables. However, Plan E may be needed when you decide to change the columns of a Summary Table, or discover a flaw in the computations. To lessen the impact of an entire build, adapt the chunking techniques in Deleting in chunks .
trans-unit.target: 计划E ：（不建议这样做。）从整个事实表“重建”整个摘要表。对于大型桌子，这样做的成本高得令人望而却步。但是，当您决定更改汇总表的列或发现计算中的缺陷时，可能需要计划E。为了减轻整个构建的影响，请在“分块删除”中调整分块技术。

trans-unit.source: Plan F: "Staging table". This is primarily for very high speed ingestion. It is mentioned briefly in this blog, and discussed more thoroughly in the companion blog: High Speed Ingestion
trans-unit.target: F计划:"中转台"。这主要是为了非常高速的摄取。在本篇博客中简单提到,在配套博客中会有更深入的讨论。高速摄取

trans-unit.source: Plugins are server components that enhance MariaDB in some way. These can be anything from new storage engines, plugins for enhancing full-text parsing, or even small enhancements, such as a plugin to get a timestamp as an integer.

trans-unit.source: Plugins that are found in the mysql.plugin table, that is those that were installed with INSTALL SONAME, INSTALL PLUGIN or mysql_plugin can be uninstalled in one of two ways:

trans-unit.source: Post Configuration tool, postConfigure, does the system configuration and setup. The servers and storages are configured during this process. It is executed from the designed 'pm1' node.
trans-unit.target: 后配置工具postConfigure,进行系统配置和设置。在这个过程中,服务器和存储设备都会进行配置。它是在设计的 "pm1 "节点上执行的。

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL has a native UUID data type, internally stored as BIN(16). This is neither an SQL nor a MariaDB data type. The best we can do is to handle it by its character representation.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL有一个本地的UUID数据类型,内部存储为BIN(16)。这既不是SQL也不是MariaDB的数据类型。我们能做的最好的就是用它的字符表示法来处理它。

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL has a similar command, EXPLAIN ANALYZE.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL有一个类似的命令 EXPLAIN ANALYZE 。

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL's foreign data wrappers can also be used to migrate from PostgreSQL to MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL的外部数据包装器也可以用于从PostgreSQL迁移到MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL's functions and procedures use a language called PL/pgSQL. This language is quite different than the default SQL/PSM language used for MariaDB's stored procedures. PL/pgSQL is more similar to PL/PSQL from Oracle, so you may find it beneficial to try migrate with SQL_MODE=ORACLE set.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL的函数和过程使用一种称为 PL/pgSQL 的语言。该语言与用于MariaDB 存储过程的默认 SQL/PSM 语言完全不同。 PL/pgSQL 与Oracle的 PL/PSQL 更相似，因此尝试使用 SQL_MODE=ORACLE 设置进行迁移可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: PostgreSQL's COPY TO allows you to copy the data from a PostgreSQL table to a text file. This data can then be loaded into MariaDB with LOAD DATA INFILE.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL的 COPY TO 允许您将数据从PostgreSQL表复制到文本文件。然后可以使用 LOAD DATA INFILE 将这些数据加载到MariaDB中。

trans-unit.source: Postponed sending of data updates to the server (cached updates mode)
trans-unit.target: 推迟向服务器发送数据更新(缓存更新模式)

trans-unit.source: Poudriere is a utility for building FreeBSD packages. It allows you to build MariaDB from a FreeBSD Jail, then serve it as a binary package to other FreeBSD hosts. You may find this is particularly useful when building to deploy multiple MariaDB servers on FreeBSD, such as with Galera Cluster or similar deployments.
trans-unit.target: Poudriere 是一个用于构建 FreeBSD 软件包的实用工具,它允许您从 FreeBSD Jail 中构建 MariaDB,然后将其作为一个二进制软件包提供给其他 FreeBSD 主机。它允许您从FreeBSD Jail中构建MariaDB,然后将其作为二进制包提供给其他FreeBSD主机。当您在FreeBSD上构建并部署多个MariaDB服务器时,比如Galera Cluster或类似的部署,您会发现这个工具特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Powerful, yet easy-to-use, DbSchema helps you design, document and manage databases without having to be a SQL pro. Easily design new tables, generate HTML5 documentation, explore and edit the database data, compare and synchronize the schema over multiple databases, edit and execute SQL, generate random data.
trans-unit.target: 强大而又易用的DbSchema帮助你设计、记录和管理数据库,而无需成为SQL专家。轻松设计新表,生成HTML5文档,探索和编辑数据库数据,比较和同步多个数据库的模式,编辑和执行SQL,生成随机数据。

trans-unit.source: Prevents DDL for each table to be backed up by acquiring MDL lock on that. NOTE: Unless --no-lock option was also specified, conflicting DDL queries , will be killed at the end of backup This is done avoid deadlock between "FLUSH TABLE WITH READ LOCK", user's DDL query (ALTER, RENAME), and MDL lock on table. Only available in MariaDB 10.2.9 and later.
trans-unit.target: 通过获取每个表的MDL锁定来防止备份每个表的DDL。注意：除非也指定了--no-lock选项，否则在备份结束时将杀死冲突的DDL查询，这是为了避免“带有读取锁定的表”，用户的DDL查询（ALTER，RENAME）和MDL之间的死锁锁在桌子上。仅在MariaDB 10.2.9和更高版本中可用。

Queries (or Questions) can be divided into four main areas: DMS (see --dms), Com_ (see --com ), COM_QUIT (see COM_QUIT and Questions at http://hack‐mysql.com/com_quit), and Unknown. --dtq lists the number of queries in each of these areas in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 打印“查询总数”（DTQ）报告（在“问题总数”报告中）。查询（或问题）可分为四个主要区域：DMS（请参阅 --dms ），Com_（请参阅 --com ），COM_QUIT（请参阅COM_QUIT和http://hack‐mysql.com/com_quit上的问题），以及未知。 --dtq 以降序列出每个区域中的查询数。

trans-unit.source: Prior to 1.0.12 / 1.1.2 DATA_SIZE was incorrectly calculated
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.12/1.1.2之前,DATA_SIZE的计算是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.3, the XtraDB/InnoDB storage engine supports two different file formats.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3之前，XtraDB / InnoDB存储引擎支持两种不同的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 5.3, the index_merge access method had one intersection strategy called intersection. That strategy can only be used when merged index scans produced rowid-ordered streams. In practice this means that an intersection could only be constructed from equality (=) conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3之前， index_merge 访问方法具有一种称为“ intersection 交集策略。仅当合并索引扫描生成按行序排列的流时才可以使用该策略。实际上，这意味着只能根据等式（=）条件构造 intersection 。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 5.3, the index_merge access method supported union, sort-union, and intersection operations. Starting from MariaDB 5.3, the sort-intersection operation is also supported. This allows the use of index_merge in a broader number of cases.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3之前， index_merge 访问方法支持 union ， sort-union 和 intersection 操作。从MariaDB 5.3开始，还支持 sort-intersection 操作。这允许在更多情况下使用 index_merge 。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 5.3, the slave would always choose the first index without considering cardinality. The slave could even choose an unusable index (like FULLTEXT) if no other index was available (MySQL Bug #58997), causing row-based replication to break in this case; this is also fixed in MariaDB 5.3.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3之前，从站将始终选择第一个索引而不考虑基数。如果没有其他索引可用，则从服务器甚至可能选择一个不可用的索引（如FULLTEXT）（MySQL Bug＃58997），从而导致基于行的复制中断；这在MariaDB 5.3中也已修复。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 5.3, the slave would always choose the first index without considering cardinality. The slave could even choose an unusable index (like FULLTEXT) if no other index was available (MySQL Bug #58997), causing row-based replication to break in this case; this is also fixed in MariaDB 5.3.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 5.3之前，从属将始终选择第一个索引而不考虑基数。如果没有其他索引可用，则从服务器甚至可能选择一个不可用的索引（如FULLTEXT）（MySQL Bug＃58997），从而导致基于行的复制在这种情况下中断；这在MariaDB 5.3中也已修复。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.1.1, the SHOW QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME statement is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.1之前，不支持 SHOW QUERY_RESPONSE_TIME 语句。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.1.36, MariaDB 10.2.18, and MariaDB 10.3.10, if you were performing a --copy-back operation, and if you did not explicitly specify a value for the datadir option either on the command line or one of the supported server option groups in an option file, then Mariabackup would not default to the server's default datadir. Instead, Mariabackup would fail with an error. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.36，MariaDB 10.2.18和MariaDB 10.3.10之前，如果您正在执行 --copy-back 操作，并且您未在命令行或一个命令行上显式指定 datadir 选项的值选项文件中受支持的服务器选项组的数量，那么Mariabackup不会默认为服务器的默认 datadir 。相反，Mariabackup会因错误而失败。例如：

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.1.38, MariaDB 10.2.22, and MariaDB 10.3.13, Mariabackup doesn't read server options from all option groups supported by the server. In those versions, it only looks for server options in the following server option groups:
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.38，MariaDB 10.2.22和MariaDB 10.3.13之前，Mariabackup不会从服务器支持的所有选项组中读取服务器选项。在这些版本中，它仅在以下服务器选项组中查找服务器选项：

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.1.38, MariaDB 10.2.22, and MariaDB 10.3.13, logging for mariabackup SSTs works the following way.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.38，MariaDB 10.2.22和MariaDB 10.3.13之前， mariabackup SST的日志记录以下列方式工作。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.1.39, MariaDB 10.2.24, and MariaDB 10.3.14, Mariabackup would actually ignore the error and continue the backup. In some of those cases, Mariabackup would even report a successful completion of the backup to the user. In later versions, Mariabackup will properly throw an error and abort when this error is encountered. See MDEV-19060 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1.39，MariaDB 10.2.24和MariaDB 10.3.14之前，Mariabackup实际上会忽略该错误并继续备份。在某些情况下，Mariabackup甚至会向用户报告备份成功完成的情况。在更高版本中，Mariabackup将正确引发错误并在遇到此错误时中止。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19060。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.2.10, Mariabackup users could run into issues if they restored a backup by manually copying the files from the backup into the datadir while the directory still contained pre-existing InnoDB redo log files. The backup itself did not contain InnoDB redo log files with the traditional ib_logfileN file names, so the pre-existing log files would remain in the datadir. If the server were started with these pre-existing log files, then it could perform crash recovery with them, which could cause the database to become inconsistent or corrupt.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.10之前，如果Mariabackup用户通过将备份中的文件手动复制到 datadir 来还原备份，而该目录仍包含预先存在的InnoDB重做日志文件，则他们可能会遇到问题。备份本身不包含具有传统 ib_logfileN 文件名的InnoDB重做日志文件，因此，预先存在的日志文件将保留在 datadir 中。如果服务器是使用这些预先存在的日志文件启动的，则它可能会对它们执行崩溃恢复，这可能导致数据库变得不一致或损坏。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.2.19 and MariaDB 10.3.10, if concurrent DDL was executed while the backup was taken, then that could cause various kinds of problems to occur.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.19和MariaDB 10.3.10之前，如果在进行备份时执行了并发DDL，则可能导致发生各种问题。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.2.24, MariaDB 10.3.15, and MariaDB 10.4.5, when you update the value on the innodb_encrypt_tables system variable InnoDB internally treats the subsequent background operations to encrypt and decrypt tablespaces as background key rotations. See MDEV-14398 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.24，MariaDB 10.3.15和MariaDB 10.4.5之前，当您更新 innodb_encrypt_tables 系统变量上的值时，InnoDB在内部将后续的后台操作视为对表空间进行加密和解密，作为后台密钥轮换。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-14398。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.2.26, MariaDB 10.3.17, and MariaDB 10.4.7, MariaDB doesn't properly calculate the row sizes while executing DDL. In these versions, unsafe tables can be created, even if InnoDB strict mode is enabled. The calculations were fixed by MDEV-19292 in MariaDB 10.2.26, MariaDB 10.3.17, and MariaDB 10.4.7. As a side effect, some tables that could be created or altered in previous versions may get rejected with the following error in these releases and any later releases.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.2.26，MariaDB 10.3.17和MariaDB 10.4.7之前，MariaDB在执行DDL时无法正确计算行大小。在这些版本中，即使启用了InnoDB严格模式，也可以创建不安全的表。MDEV-19292在MariaDB 10.2.26，MariaDB 10.3.17和MariaDB 10.4.7中修复了计算问题。副作用是，在这些版本和任何更高版本中，可能在先前版本中创建或更改的某些表可能会由于以下错误而被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.3.1, only the default mysql.gtid_slave_pos table is available. In these versions, the table should preferably be using the storage engine that is used for most replicated transactions.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.1之前，仅默认的 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表可用。在这些版本中，该表最好使用用于大多数复制事务的存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.3.1, the padstr parameter was mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.3.1之前， padstr 参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MariaDB 10.4.0, all password validation plugins are incompatible with the pam authentication plugin. See Authentication Plugin - PAM: Conflicts with Password Validation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.4.0之前，所有密码验证插件均与 pam 身份验证插件不兼容。有关更多信息，请参见身份验证插件-PAM：与密码验证冲突。

trans-unit.source: Prior to MySQL 5.1.2 (before the DEFINER and SQL SECURITY clauses were implemented), privileges required for objects used in a view are checked at view creation time.

trans-unit.source: Prior to MySQL 5.1.29, When you modify an existing view, the current view definition is backed up and saved. It is stored in that table's database directory, in a subdirectory named arc. The backup file for a view v is named v.frm-00001. If you alter the view again, the next backup is named v.frm-00002. The three latest view backup definitions are stored. Backed up view definitions are not preserved by mysqldump, or any other such programs, but you can retain them using a file copy operation. However, they are not needed for anything but to provide you with a backup of your previous view definition. It is safe to remove these backup definitions, but only while mysqld is not running. If you delete the arc subdirectory or its files while mysqld is running, you will receive an error the next time you try to alter the view:
trans-unit.target: 在MySQL 5.1.29之前，修改现有视图时，将备份并保存当前视图定义。它存储在该表的数据库目录中的名为arc的子目录中。视图v的备份文件名为v.frm-00001。如果再次更改视图，则下一个备份名为v.frm-00002。存储了三个最新的视图备份定义。mysqldump不保留备份的视图定义或任何其他此类程序，但是您可以使用文件复制操作来保留它们。但是，除了为您提供先前视图定义的备份外，它们并不需要。删除这些备份定义是安全的，但仅当mysqld未运行时才删除。如果在mysqld运行时删除arc子目录或其文件，则下次尝试更改视图时将收到错误消息：

trans-unit.target: 权限可以在全局范围内设置,也可以为整个数据库、表或例程、或为表中的单个列设置。某些权限只能在某些级别设置。

trans-unit.source: Probable solution: Configure the BIOS to "interleave" the RAM allocations. This should prevent the premature swapping, at the cost of off-CPU RAM accesses half the time. Well, you have the costly accesses anyway, since you really want to use all of RAM. Older MySQL versions: numactl --interleave=all. Or: innodb_numa_interleave=1
trans-unit.target: 可能的解决方案：将BIOS配置为“交错” RAM分配。这应该防止过早交换，但代价是CPU外RAM访问的时间只有一半。好吧，由于您确实想使用所有RAM，因此无论如何您都需要进行昂贵的访问。较旧的MySQL版本：numactl --interleave = all。或：innodb_numa_interleave = 1

trans-unit.target: 也许永远不要做UNIQUE(foo(20)),因为这是在列的前20个字符上应用唯一性约束,而不是整个列。

trans-unit.source: Procedure parameters can be declared with any character set/collation. If the character set and collation are not specifically set, the database defaults at the time of creation will be used. If the database defaults change at a later stage, the stored procedure character set/collation will not be changed at the same time; the stored procedure needs to be dropped and recreated to ensure the same character set/collation as the database is used.
trans-unit.target: 存储过程参数可以用任何字符集/拼接方式来声明,如果没有特别设置字符集和拼接方式,将使用创建时的数据库默认值。如果没有特别设置字符集和拼接,将使用创建时的数据库默认值。如果后期数据库默认值发生变化,存储过程的字符集/拼合不会同时发生变化,需要放弃并重新创建存储过程,以确保使用与数据库相同的字符集/拼合。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to a row at a given physical offset beyond that position. Returns value evaluated at the row that is offset rows after the current row within the partition; if there is no such row, instead return default. Both offset and default are evaluated with respect to the current row. If omitted, offset defaults to 1 and default to null.
trans-unit.target: 提供对给定物理偏移量的行的访问。返回在分区内当前行之后偏移行的行的值;如果没有这样的行,则返回默认值。offset和default都是相对于当前行进行评估的。如果省略,偏移量默认为1,默认值为空。

trans-unit.source: Provides an API that allows writing additional FDW in C++.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个API,允许用C++编写额外的FDW。

trans-unit.source: Provides details on using third party products and tools with MariaDB ColumnStore
trans-unit.target: 提供了使用第三方产品和工具与MariaDB ColumnStore的细节。

trans-unit.source: Provides fast CJK-ready full text searching using column store.
trans-unit.target: 使用列存储提供快速的中日韩全文搜索。

trans-unit.source: Provides high-availability by upgrading slave to master.
trans-unit.target: 通过将从站升级为主站,提供高可用性。

trans-unit.source: Provides optimal backup support for all storage engines that store things on local disk.
trans-unit.target: 为所有存储在本地磁盘上的东西的存储引擎提供最佳的备份支持。

trans-unit.source: Provides remote, block, dynamic and virtual indexing.
trans-unit.target: 提供远程、块、动态和虚拟索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides status information about the binary log files of the master.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关主服务器二进制日志文件的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides support of MariaDB ColumnStore User Module Replication
trans-unit.target: 提供对MariaDB ColumnStore用户模块复制的支持。

trans-unit.source: Providing that in each file the applying information is internally set for Excel as a table named "bank account". This extension to ODBC does not support multiple=2. The qchar option was specified to make the identifiers quoted in the select statement sent to ODBC, in particular the when the table or column names contain blanks, to avoid SQL syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 假设在每个文件中，在内部将Excel的申请信息设置为名为“银行帐户”的表。ODBC的此扩展不支持多个 = 2。该QChar则指定选项，以使在发送给ODBC select语句引用标识符，特别是当表或列名包含空格，以避免SQL语法错误。

trans-unit.source: Providing this callback is particularly important on Windows, because Windows GUI applications have no associated console and the default dialog function will not be able to reach the user. An example of Windows GUI client that does it correctly is HeidiSQL.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上提供此回调特别重要，因为Windows GUI应用程序没有关联的控制台，并且默认对话框功能将无法到达用户。正确执行此操作的Windows GUI客户端示例是HeidiSQL。

trans-unit.source: Purge undo log truncation occurs when InnoDB truncates an entire InnoDB undo log tablespace, rather than deleting individual InnoDB undo log records.
trans-unit.target: 当InnoDB截断整个InnoDB撤消日志表空间而不是删除单个InnoDB撤消日志记录时，将发生清除撤消日志截断。

trans-unit.source: Purges are performed with a linear algorithm, so a large QC (even 200MB) can be noticeably slow.
trans-unit.target: 清洗是用线性算法进行的,所以大的QC(即使是200MB)也会明显的慢。
